alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Laurens; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Laurens, east central Greenville and southwestern Spartanburg Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of Greenville Downtown, or near GSP Airport, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greer, Five Forks, Woodruff, Duncan, Lyman, Wellford, Roebuck, Reidville, Moore and GSP Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Laurens; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
